Docs.summary: Extends the <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.ILogger"> interface to provide properties to forward events to a logger running in a different process. It can also be used create filtering loggers.
Get or set by the build engine to allow node loggers to forward messages to the central logger.
Docs.value: An <see cref="T:Microsoft.Build.Framework.IEventRedirector"> representing the event redirector to forward messages to.

Docs.summary: Get or set by the build engine or node to inform the forwarding logger on which node it is running.
Docs.value: An integer representing the node ID on which the build engine is running.
